titleStmt.title: The King against Reginald Tucker. The case of William Hall Esq upon a writ of error to reverse the judgment of the Court of King's-Bench for the reversing the attainder of the defendant Tucker.
titleStmt.author: Hall, William, 1675-1748.

notesStmt.note: With a half title on reverse that reads: The King against Tucker; the case of William Hall Esq.
Argues for a reversal of the judgement against Hall, saying it was done on a minor technicality. Includes a chronology of the case.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
